subject: This proves it
body:
You might be wondering why your lady is taking so many
showers or baths.
They are doing this because you have a small load.  
Girls like to be showered with hot loads from their men.
Give them a shower in wondercum, and save some water.
If you don’t do anything about your small load, she
will be getting showered from some other guy.
Need some wondercum?
http://www.levb.net
 
Yours Truly,
Mr. Wonder
 
 





For years men have gone without getting help for their "Little" problem.
It is very embarrassing to admit that you have a small load.
Your wife or girlfriend may love you, but when they are not being showered in your man juice, they will be going somewhere else.

Turn your pipe into a fire hose:

http://www.levb.net
